class.name: PeerAddressChangeNotification
class.javadoc:
Notification emitted when a destination address on a multi-homed peer encounters a change.
1.7

Defines the type of address change event that occurred to the destination address on a multi-homed peer when it encounters a change of interface details.

Some of these events types are only generated when the association supports dynamic address reconfiguration, e.g. {@code SCTP_ADDR_ADDED},{@code SCTP_ADDR_REMOVED}, etc. 1.7
The address specified can no longer be reached. Any data sent to this address is rerouted to an alternate until this address becomes reachable.
The address is no longer part of the association.
The address is now part of the association.
This address has now been made to be the primary destination address.
This address has now been confirmed as a valid address.
